DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine optimal dose regimen HM11260C , combination hypocaloric diet , reduce weight obese subject otherwise consider stable health .
DOC.brief_title: Effect LAPS-Exendin Body Weight Obese Population
DOC.criteria: 1 . Age : 18 year 65 year Genders : male female healthy obese population nondiabetes stable body weight least 3 month prior screen 2 . Exclusion Criteria Pregnant nursing ( lactate ) woman Druginduced obesity Diabetes mellitus ( type 1 , 2 , ) Previous surgical treatment obesity Any known history severe gastrointestinal ( GI ) disease intolerance Known history pancreatitis presence raise serum amylase lipase History suicide attempt recent history ( within 2 year prior screen ) major depression , anxiety , psychiatric disease require treatment prescription medication include selective serotonin reuptake inhibitor ( SSRIs ) , serotonin norepinephrine reuptake inhibitor ( SNRIs ) , antipsychotic , lithium .
